attributes.action: bring justice for baby p and any other child who has suffered in the hands of an adult
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it is truely horrific what has happened to baby p, and for his murderers to only be given 14 years between them quite frankly it is a JOKE! this whole government is a joke when it comes to things like this!!!
i believe these people should be made to suffer like they made that poor child suffer! Everyone involved with the whole case should be sacked too, it is disgusting a doctor could not find broken bones on a 17 month old baby! the social workers in their borough knew he was being abused and yet nothing was done!! as for Sharon Shoesmith what good has she done being The head of Haringey Council.

This needs to be sorted out! it is not a joke!! i know if it was your own children it would be a different story

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
